definition[0]: a place where the water has special minerals in it, and where people go to improve their health by drinking the water or swimming in it
definition[1]: a place where people go to improve their health and beauty, especially through swimming, exercise, beauty treatments etc
definition[2]: a bath or pool that sends currents of hot water around you
